Reviews.Title: Great price, works like any other IP camera
Reviews.Author: T. Meadows "TM"
Reviews.Content: Was a little different to set up but once I got it going it works like any other IP camera such as Foscam, etc.Great price, you can not beat it for $29!Connect the network cable, connect the power.Give it about 30 secondsenter the ip address on the sticker on the bottom of the camera. it is a strange ip address but once you enter it it will change over to your local ip and port number (for example 192.168.1.1:82) <---not a real ip just an examplethen you can easily change the password, change the port, add your wireless network etc. very easily.i then port forwarded like my foscams, etc.it works with blue iris, just use wanscam for the camerai also have it working with my tinycam monitor pro using wanscam for the camera.it has a built in mic, trigger alarm feature, IR night vision.pretty nice.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, but made me work for it.
Reviews.Author: Edward S. Barski
Reviews.Content: I own a couple of other brands of wifi enabled IP cameras and this unit works as good if not better than a higher priced ones.  The sound is clear and static free, the picture is good even with the night vision ion.  Would have given 4 stars except for the fact that the camera web interface starts up in foreign language and it takes awhile find the menu to switch it to English, also hard to find Android apps that support this Mfg. and Model.

ProductInfo.Features:
P2P, free app "iSeeu", no need to do complex network setting, Plug and Play, break through the network limits.
KaiCong provides an account to manage all KaiCong devices' performances
Domain name: you can use the domain name to view over the Internet [end with KaiCong.info]
Multi-channel Display: free centralized Monitoring software,  CMS, supports 100 screens viewing from different places, long time recording, video playback and other functions
Size: 210*140*130mm
ProductInfo.Name: Baby Monitor P2P IP Camera KaiCong Sip1603 Plug and Play WiFi Wireless Network Remote Infrared Camera Support Multiple Languages
